name: Crime City Kill 3D
description:
Install and play our new best attacking game Crime City Kill 3D. Do you want to take the challenge of eliminating these terrorist rivals? Commando games, Commando Missions, city combat whatever you are looking for is here. If yes then go ahead and wipe out the deadly terrorist forces and destroy their domination in your city. You are equipped with the latest sniper rifle, handle your rifle precisely, aim carefully, target your enemies and shoot them immediately. Do not let them escape. Accomplish your mission without failing the level.

Commander your city needs your bravery. AIM and SHOOT the target. Download now for free.

Turn your device into a new flashing gameplay gadget. Kill all your enemies; you are an expert sniper with an excellent aiming ability. You are ranked higher in the army, and now it's time for you to prove that you were given this rank for true. You have got a heavy gun, and your target is right in front of you. You need to aim correctly, load your heavy gun and fire on the head of your enemy.

Game has the following exciting features:
Fantastic Graphics
Real City Sniper Experience
Become the commando adventure with commando mission to complete
A complete demo of sniper games
3D Environment
first Person Shooting
Excellent city Environment
Realistic effects and new challenges to your mission.
Outclass sound effects, Background and shooting sounds.
Easy and intuitive controls
